mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(post_no, user_id, title, text, thumbnail_image_file, reg_date, lat, lng, hashtag, flag_pu) VALUES(seq_post_post_no.nextval, #{user.userId}, #{title}, #{text}, #{thumbNailFileName}, TO_DATE(#{regDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{lat}, #{lng}, #{hashtag}, 'UC')
mapper.select: SELECT post_no FROM post WHERE title=#{title} AND reg_date=TO_DATE(#{regDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT post_no, post.user_id as user_id, title, text, thumbnail_image_file, post.reg_date as reg_date, view_count, lat, lng, hashtag, profile_image_file FROM post, users WHERE post_no=#{postNo} AND post.user_id = users.user_id
SELECT hashtag FROM post WHERE flag_pu='UC' AND hashtag LIKE '%${value}%'
